definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Two cases of cholera, one of which has ended fatally, have occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 这里发生过两起霍乱病例，其中一人已经死亡。

sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我们这样做，现已经有十九年了。

sentences.english: The local store has started selling baguettes and Belgian beers.
sentences.chinese: 当地的商店已经开始出售法国棍式面包和比利时啤酒。

sentences.english: Mass armies (in most societies) have been replaced by highly trained professional-technical military forces.
sentences.chinese: 数量庞大的军队已经被高技术军队取代。

sentences.english: The book was out of print, but I eventually ran it to earth at a secondhand bookshop.
sentences.chinese: 那本书已经绝版，但我终于在一家旧书店淘到了它。

sentences.english: B. The college I applied to has accepted me.
sentences.chinese: 我报了名的学院已经录取了我。

sentences.english: This is a function declaring the hot summer has been coming.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个宣告火辣的夏天已经来临的仪式。

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知识产权已经成为外交外贸领域的重要议题。

sentences.english: The one hundred and first meridian was passed.
sentences.chinese: 现在已经越过了经线一百零一度了。

sentences.english: The mobile phone has already enabled developing countries to skip fixed-line networks.
sentences.chinese: 移动电话已经使发展中国家跨越了固话网络这个阶段。

sentences.english: I have the answer when I am in Eurasia.
sentences.chinese: 当我身临欧亚时，我已经知道了。

sentences.english: It was time to write down and acknowledge that he was gone.
sentences.chinese: 这是记下和承认它已经离去这一事实的时候。

sentences.english: Doudou has been home half a month, how I miss him.
sentences.chinese: 豆豆回家已经半个月了，我好想他啊。

sentences.english: They've already implanted electrodes into blind patients on a temporary basis, allowing them to see flashes of light.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经为盲者植入暂时的义眼，让他们能看到闪光。

sentences.english: The thief had run more than forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 那个小偷已经跑了四十多里路。

definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
